channel.title: How do I use Player X and player Y?
channel.description:
I want to make it so when a player comes to a certain place, they get teleported or get an item at that 1 square, how do I make it work?
(I need something like if X = # || Y = #) { blah blah here
Help appriciated :)

item.title: How do I use Player X and player Y?
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Dark Horse:

Gotta make a void that cycles through everyone online seeing if they are on that spot, then put the void in the process() method

I guessed that, just wasn’t sure what to do with it. Thanks

Read full topic
